pages.text: This chapter contains credits for the ArchitPack Greg 3. $(br2)We would like to thank all people that are in there whose work makes this pack possible, as well as the community members who have contributed feedback and suggestions.

pages.title: Original Creator
pages.text: APG series is originally owned by ArchitektRadim. $(br)This pack was made with his permission and under his curation.

pages.title: Developers
pages.text: §lPuff (@puff_official)§r: $(br)Developer, Pack Maintainer. $(br2)§lRadim (@architektradim)§r: $(br)Original creator of the series.
